#!/bin/bash

# 1. model training

#	weights_name -> name of weights generated by training

export weights_name=node1.pth

# 2. Set node 3 env variables (feature evaluation)

#	exp_name -> experiment name
	
#	feat_name -> filename of features to be evaluated (e.g. nikita_features_all_lincs.npz). 
#	Created by feature extraction done in node B
	
#	model_name -> name of model features associated with 

export exp_name=node1
export feat_name=sample1k.npz
export model_name=cellpainting_dinov2
